title: user login with valid credentials
description: Test the /login endpoint with valid username and password to verify successful user authentication and session creation.

title: user login with invalid credentials
description: Test the /login endpoint with incorrect username or password to ensure the system returns a 401 status and denies access.

title: user registration with valid data
description: Test the /register endpoint by submitting a new username and password to verify successful user account creation.

title: user logout functionality
description: Test the /logout endpoint to confirm that the user session is terminated and the user is redirected to the login page.

title: resume upload with valid pdf and parameters
description: Test the /upload_resume endpoint by uploading a valid PDF resume along with question count, job role, and HR question inclusion to verify successful text extraction and AI question generation.

title: resume upload with invalid file format
description: Test the /upload_resume endpoint by uploading a non-PDF file or corrupted file to ensure the system returns a 400 error indicating invalid file.

title: display generated interview questions
description: Test the /questions endpoint to verify that the generated interview questions based on the uploaded resume and job role are correctly rendered.

title: evaluate interview answer with valid data
description: Test the /evaluate_answer endpoint by submitting a valid answer and question index to verify AI-powered evaluation and feedback are returned successfully.

title: ats compatibility analysis with valid resume
description: Test the /check_ats endpoint by uploading a valid resume PDF and job role to verify ATS compatibility scoring and skill gap recommendations are provided.

title: admin dashboard access control and data display
description: Test the /admin_dashboard endpoint to ensure only admin users can access the dashboard and that user analytics and reports are displayed correctly.
